mapper.select: select a.no, a.channel_no as channelNo, a.master_crew_user_no as masterCrewUserNo, a.creation_date as creationDate, a.name from crew as a, crew_user as b where a.channel_no = #{channelNo} and b.crew_no = a.no and b.user_no = #{userNo};
select no from crew where channel_no = #{channelNo} and master_crew_user_no = #{userNo} order by no desc limit 1;
mapper.insert: insert into crew_user values (null, #{crewNo}, #{userNo}, 1, now(), 1, now());
mapper.select: select a.user_no as userNo, b.name as userName from crew_user a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and crew_no=#{no};
mapper.update: update crew_user set lastIn = now() where crew_no = #{crewNo} and user_no= #{userNo};
